original_text: Immediately, the believers in Berea sent Paul away to go to the coast. But Silas and Timothy stayed in Berea.
korean_text: 형제들이 곧 바울을 내보내어 바다까지 가게 하되 실라와 디모데는 아직 거기 머물더라

sentences.original_text: Immediately, the believers in Berea sent Paul away
But Silas and Timothy stayed in Berea
